overview: At 35 years old, following her recent divorce, Julie becomes the new boss of her family's company. This hot swinger quickly turns it into a real sex place. Getting fucked by her new accountant while her secretary takes a hard dick in the ass by the union leader, that's how she "manages" her employees. Her Sales manager, who is rather submissive with his hot wife will get the chance to fuck her in a very private club.
title: Julia, 35 year old, Libertin Boss
